channel.title: The new RuneScape gameframe
channel.description:
I want to see what you others thinks about new RuneScape's gameframe, vote & discuss.
In my opinion I say it sucks, it looks ugly and they should stick to the classic or atleast what they had before.
Picture taken from Google - http://i42.tinypic.com/dqrz90.png

item.title: The new RuneScape gameframe
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

When I logged in and saw the new stats I quit. I quit for good. Changed all passwords on my accounts to random shit, I quit. They pushed the last straw trying to remake the game frame like this. I’m just done.

rofl, I am so confused on how to use the emotes, they added like 50 more and all they did was add stupid ass interfaces, making absolutely no point in an addition to runescape

Read full topic

item.title: The new RuneScape gameframe
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Andrew Ferguson:

When I logged in and saw the new stats I quit. I quit for good. Changed all passwords on my accounts to random shit, I quit. They pushed the last straw trying to remake the game frame like this. I’m just done.

In all honesty I was so close to quitting too. Only reason I didn’t was cause I just topped up membs lawl. The colours clash so bad, it reminds me of a crappy mmoD:. Hopefully they’ll either revert or change the game enough to make it look good cause apparently there like half way through this(don’t quote me on that just rumours).

Read full topic

item.title: The new RuneScape gameframe
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:21, topic:428864”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=531561.msg3884948#msg3884948 date=1326366457]

RuneScape’s getting out of control, trying to take their graphics way to high.
I RAGE QUIT, because my computer can’t support their graphics/needed speed.
I login, I DC, I log back in, I teleport, I DC.
SO many people have quit/dropped playing it because of that.
(I am aware you can toggle speeds/settings)

If you’re constantly DCing it’s your internet, not Runescape.
[/quote]

:L @ you, could be internet BUT its java…
java.exe hits a limit while running rs, than it forces a white screen…[/quote]

What limit are you talking about?

Read full topic

item.title: The new RuneScape gameframe
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

I have a 12GB RAM gaming computer, and even I experience lag when playing fullscreen,
I don’t play actually but just logged in to check the new gameframe

anyways its fucking horrible
once rs was about medieval, like the normal armour, dragon armour was already a fantasy and the creatures, it was more a game of old medieval stories
now it’s just getting a fantasy game like wow, the game is totally ruined already a long time ago when i quit playin
It’s all about attracting the graphics-horny kids from these days,
they forgot the story behind it :’(

Thats why we need better coded oldschool rsps’s!
and not loading 690’s or whatever if you want that just go playing rs with the other kids

Read full topic
